author: [texan...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115421075386950174577/)
title: Double clicking on kicker panel causes game to hang

comments.body:
I feel kinda dumb.
I just realized that, for some reason, I've been instinctively double clicking the button, and that is the actual cause of the hangs. This time I tried it with single and multiple kicks and the same thing happens. If I just let the AI go about its business then everything is just fine and dandy. If however I click twice on the OK button or the number indicating the intended kicks then the game freezes.
So basically the solution is to click only once and not to be dumb :)
comments.author: [texan...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115421075386950174577/)

comments.body: Glad you were able to solve it. But double clicking shouldn't hang. We'll look into it, thanks!
